text: GQ Lupi b or GQ Lupi B is a possible exoplanet, brown dwarf or sub-brown dwarf orbiting (going around) GQ Lupi. Its discovery was announced in April 2005. This was one of the first extrasolar planet candidates to be imaged directly, along with 2M1207b. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:Exoplanets
title: GQ Lupi b
